title: Chapter XXXV - New York State Housing Finance Agency
content:
Chapter XXXV - New York State Housing Finance Agency

State Regulations

Subchapter A - Public Access To Records (Part 2150)

Subchapter B - Affordable Home Ownership Development Program (Part 2160 to 2176)

Subchapter C - Prompt Payment Policy Statement (Part 2185)

Subchapter D - Infrastructure Development Demonstration Program (Part 2186)

Subchapter E - Implementation Of State Environmental Quality Review Act (Part 2187)

Subchapter F - Low Income Housing Tax Credit Qualified Allocation Plan (Part 2188 to 2201)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Subchapter A - Public Access To Records (Part 2150)

Subchapter B - Affordable Home Ownership Development Program (Part 2160 to 2176)

Subchapter C - Prompt Payment Policy Statement (Part 2185)

Subchapter D - Infrastructure Development Demonstration Program (Part 2186)

Subchapter E - Implementation Of State Environmental Quality Review Act (Part 2187)

Subchapter F - Low Income Housing Tax Credit Qualified Allocation Plan (Part 2188 to 2201)
